markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Updraft](/Spells.aspx?ID=1058)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

A powerful blast of wind erupts from the ground, launching the target into the air and sending it crashing back down. The collision deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the target is knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the damage by 2d6.
name: Updraft

summary_markdown: A powerful blast of wind erupts from the ground, launching the target into the air and sending it crashing back down.
text: Updraft Source Secrets of Magic pg. 201 1.1 Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 60 feet Target 1 creature Saving Throw basic Reflex --- A powerful blast of wind erupts from the ground, launching the target into the air and sending it crashing back down. The collision deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the target is knocked prone. --- Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 2d6.
